name: Making New Friends
description:
Explore this prototype world to meet 20 different neighbors. Each neighbor has a different personality, and would love to meet you! Check the forest, the beach, just about anywhere. Move with W,A,D (no S, you can't go backwards!), talk with SPACE, and select dialogue responses with the Mouse.

I really wanted to prototype with a world-curving shader, plus I wanted to learn how to use Unity's Terrain Editor system. I used this game as my excuse to learn both!

NOTE: This game is a prototype and contains some weird texture clipping in parts of the water. That is because of the world-curving shader and I couldn't quite get everything to play nicely.
